67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3b9.content: A list of free public APIs.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3c6.title: Simplescraper
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3c6.content: Trigger your webhook after each operation. The free plan includes 100 cloud scrape credits.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3ca.title: shrtcode API

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3d0.title: Svix

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3d5.title: Weights & Biases
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3d5.content: The developer-first MLOps platform. Build better models faster with experiment tracking, dataset versioning, and model management. Free tier for personal projects only, with 100 GB of storage included.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3d7.title: wolfram.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3d7.content: Built-in knowledge-based algorithms in the cloud.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3d8.title: wrapapi.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3d8.content: Turn any website into a parameterized API. 30k API calls per month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3d9.title: ZenRows
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3d9.content: Web Scraping API & proxy server that bypasses any anti-bot solution while offering javascript rendering, rotating proxies, and geotargeting. The free tier of 1000 API calls.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3da.title: Zenscrape
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3da.content: Web scraping API with headless browsers, residentials IPs, and straightforward pricing. One thousand free API calls/month and extra credits for students and non-profits.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3db.title: IPQuery
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3db.content: Unlimited IP API for developers, no ratelimits, or pricing.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3dc.title: ip-api
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3dc.content: IP Geolocation API, Free for non-commercial use, no API key required, limited to 45 req/minute from the same IP address for the free plan.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3dd.title: WebScraping.AI
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3dd.content: Simple Web Scraping API with built-in parsing, Chrome rendering, and proxies. Two thousand free API calls per month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3de.title: Zipcodestack
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3de.content: Free Zip Code API and Postal Code Validation. Ten thousand free requests/month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3df.title: huggingface.co
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3df.content: Build, train, and deploy NLP models for Pytorch, TensorFlow, and JAX. Free up to 30k input characters/mo.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e0.title: vatcheckapi.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e0.content: Simple and free VAT number validation API. Five hundred free requests per month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e1.title: numlookupapi.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e1.content: Free phone number validation API - 100k free requests / month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e2.title: Volca
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e2.content: Free API providing lists of technologies such as programming languages and database systems. Unlimited free requests.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e3.title: Query.me
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e3.content: Collaborative data notebooks that execute script-like and allow to fetch and send data via SQL, API, and many custom blocks, like Slack and Email. Free for small Teams.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e4.title: ERD Lab
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e4.content: Free cloud-based entity relationship diagram (ERD) tool made for developers.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e5.title: What The Diff
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e5.content: AI-powered code review assistant. The free plan has a limit of 25,000 monthly tokens (~10 PRs).

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e6.title: Zipcodestack
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e6.content: Free Zip Code API and Postal Code Validation. Ten thousand free requests/month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e7.title: OpenWeb Ninja
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e7.content: Extremely comprehensive real-time SERP and public data APIs: Google Search, Shopping, Jobs, Images, Lens, News, Google Maps Businesses / Places, Reviews, Photos, Website Emails and Social Contacts Scraper, Amazon, Yelp and more. All APIs include a free tier with 100 to 200 free monthly requests.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e8.title: Tavily AI
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e8.content: API for online serach and rapid insights and comprehensive research, with the capability of organization of research results. 1000 request/month for the Free tier with No credit card required.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e9.title: Composio
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3e9.content: Integration platform for AI Agents and LLMs. Integrate over 200+ tools across the agentic internet.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3ea.title: WeatherXu
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3ea.content: Global weather data including current conditions, hourly and daily forecasts, and weather alerts via our API. Integrating AI models and ML systems to analyze and combine multiple weather models to deliver improved forecast accuracy. Free tier includes 10,000 API calls/month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3eb.title: Zuplo
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3eb.content: Free API Management platform to design, build, and deploy APIs to the Edge. Add API Key authentication, rate limiting, developer documentation and Monetization to any API in minutes. OpenAPI-native and fully-programmable with web standard apis & Typescript. The free plan offers up to 10 projects, unlimited production edge environments, 250 API keys, 100K monthly requests, and 1GB egress.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3ec.title: Amazon SageMaker
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3ec.content: A cloud-based ML platform with JupyterLab and terminal access. The free tier includes 8 hours of CPU (max 4 hours per session) or 4 hours of GPU per day.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3ed.title: Artifactory
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3ed.content: An artifact repository that supports numerous package formats like Maven, Docker, Cargo, Helm, PyPI, CocoaPods, and GitLFS. Includes package scanning tool XRay and CI/CD tool Pipelines (formerly Shippable) with a free tier of 2,000 CI/CD minutes per month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3ee.title: central.sonatype.org
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3ee.content: The default artifact repository for Apache Maven, SBT, and other build systems.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3ef.title: cloudrepo.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3ef.content: Cloud-based, private and public, Maven and PyPi repositories. Free for open-source projects.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f0.title: cloudsmith.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f0.content: Simple, secure, and centralized repository service for Java/Maven, RedHat, Debian, Python, Ruby, Vagrant, and more. Free tier + free for open source.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f1.title: jitpack.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f1.content: Maven repository for JVM and Android projects on GitHub, free for public projects.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f2.title: packagecloud.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f2.content: Easy to use repository hosting for Maven, RPM, DEB, PyPi, NPM, and RubyGem packages (has free tier).

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f4.title: Gemfury
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f4.content: Private and public artifact repos for Maven, PyPi, NPM, Go Module, Nuget, APT, and RPM repositories. Free for public projects.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f5.title: paperspace
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f5.content: Build & scale AI models, Develop, train, and deploy AI applications, free plan: public projects, 5Gb storage, basic instances.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f6.title: RepoForge
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f6.content: Private cloud-hosted repository for Python, Debian, NPM packages and Docker registries. Free plan for open source/public projects.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f7.title: RepoFlow
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f7.content: RepoFlow Simplifies package management with support for npm, PyPI, Docker, Go, Helm, and more. Try it for free with 10GB storage, 10GB bandwidth, 100 packages, and unlimited users in the cloud, or self-hosted for personal use only.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f8.title: 3Cols
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f8.content: A free cloud-based code snippet manager for personal and collaborative code.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f9.title: Bitwarden
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3f9.content: The easiest and safest way for individuals, teams, and business organizations to store, share, and sync sensitive data.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3fa.title: Braid
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3fa.content: Chat app designed for teams. Free for public access group, unlimited users, history, and integrations. also, it provides a self-hostable open-source version.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3fb.title: cally.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3fb.content: Find the perfect time and date for a meeting. Simple to use, works great for small and large groups.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3fc.title: Calendly
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3fc.content: Calendly is the tool for connecting and scheduling meetings. The free plan provides 1 Calendar connection per user and Unlimited sessions. Desktop and Mobile apps are also offered.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3fd.title: Discord
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3fd.content: Chat with public/private rooms. Markdown text, voice, video, and screen sharing capabilities. Free for unlimited users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3fe.title: Telegram
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3fe.content: Telegram is for everyone who wants fast, reliable messaging and calls. Business users and small teams may like the large groups, usernames, desktop apps, and powerful file-sharing options.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3ff.title: Dubble
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c3ff.content: Free Step-by-Step Guide creator. Take screenshots, document processes and colloborate with your team. Also supports async screen recording.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c400.title: Duckly
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c400.content: Talk and collaborate in real time with your team. Pair programming with IDE, terminal sharing, voice, video, and screen sharing. Free for small teams.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c401.title: Dyte
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c401.content: The most developer-friendly live video & audio SDK, featuring collaborative plugins to enhance productivity and engagement. The free tier includes monthly 10,000 minutes of live video/audio usage.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c402.title: evernote.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c402.content: Tool for organizing information. Share your notes and work together with others

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c403.title: Fibery
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c403.content: Connected workspace platform. Free for single users, up to 2 GB disk space.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c404.title: flock.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c404.content: A faster way for your team to communicate. Free Unlimited Messages, Channels, Users, Apps & Integrations

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c405.title: Gather
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c405.content: A better way to meet online. Centered around fully customizable spaces, Gather makes spending time with your communities just as easy as real life. Free for up to 10 concurrent users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c406.title: gokanban.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c406.content: Syntax-based, no registration Kanban Board for fast use. Free with no limitations.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c407.title: flat.social
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c407.content: Interactive customizable spaces for team meetings & happy hours socials. Unlimited meetings, free up to 8 concurrent users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c408.title: GitDailies
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c408.content: Daily reports of your team's Commit and Pull Request activity on GitHub. Includes Push visualizer, peer recognition system, and custom alert builder. The free tier has unlimited users, three repos, and 3 alert configs.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c409.title: gitter.im
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c409.content: Chat, for GitHub. Unlimited public and private rooms, free for teams of up to 25

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c40a.title: Hackmd.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c40a.content: Real time collaboration & writing tool for markdown format docs/files. Like Google Docs but for markdown files. Free unlimited number of "notes", but the number of collaborators (invitee) for private notes & template [will be limited](https://hackmd.io/pricing).

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c40b.title: hangouts.google.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c40b.content: One place for all your conversations, for free, need a Google account

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c40c.title: HeySpace
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c40c.content: Task management tool with chat, calendar, timeline and video calls. Free for up to 5 users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c40d.title: helplightning.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c40d.content: Help over video with augmented reality. Free without analytics, encryption, support

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c40e.title: ideascale.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c40e.content: Allow clients to submit ideas and vote, free for 25 members in 1 community

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c40f.title: Igloo
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c40f.content: Internal portal for sharing documents, blogs, calendars, etc. Free for up to 10 users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c410.title: Keybase
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c410.content: Keybase is a FOSS alternative to Slack; it keeps everyone's chats and files safe, from families to communities to companies.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c411.title: Google Meet
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c411.content: Use Google Meet for your business's online video meeting needs. Meet provides secure, easy-to-join online meetings.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c412.title: /meet for Slack
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c412.content: Start Google Meetings directly from Slack by using /meet in any channel, group, or DM. Free without any limitations.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c413.title: Livecycle
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c413.content: Livecycle is an inclusive collaboration platform that makes workflows frictionless for cross-functional product teams and open-source projects.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c414.title: Lockitbot
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c414.content: Reserve and lock shared resources within Slack like Rooms, Dev environments , servers etc. Free for upto 2 resources

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c415.title: MarkUp
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c415.content: MarkUp lets you collect feedback directly on top of your websites, PDFs and images.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c416.title: Proton Pass
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c416.content: Password manager with built-in email aliases, 2FA authenticator, sharing and passkeys. Available on web, browser extension, and mobile app and desktop.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c417.title: Visual Debug
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c417.content: A Visual feedback tool for better client-dev communication

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c418.title: meet.jit.si
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c418.content: One-click video conversations, and screen sharing, for free

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c419.title: Microsoft Teams
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c419.content: Microsoft Teams is a chat-based digital hub that brings conversations, content, and apps together in one place all from a single experience. Free for up to 500k users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c41a.title: Miro
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c41a.content: Scalable, secure, cross-device, and enterprise-ready collaboration whiteboard for distributed teams. With a freemium plan.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c41b.title: nootiz
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c41b.content: The go-to tool for gathering and managing visual feedback on any website

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c41c.title: Notion
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c41c.content: Notion is a note-taking and collaboration application with markdown support that integrates tasks, wikis, and databases. The company describes the app as an all-in-one workspace for note-taking, project management and task management. In addition to cross-platform apps, it can be accessed via most web browsers.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c41d.title: Nuclino
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c41d.content: A lightweight and collaborative wiki for all your team's knowledge, docs, and notes. Free plan with all essential features, up to 50 items, and 5GB storage.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c41e.title: OnlineInterview.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c41e.content: Free code interview platform with embedded video chat, drawing board, and online code editor where you can compile and run your code on the browser. You can create a remote interview room with just one click.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c41f.title: Quidlo Timesheets
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c41f.content: A simple timesheet and time tracking app for teams. The free plan has time tracking and generating reports features for up to 10 users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c420.title: PageShare.dev
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c420.content: Adds visual review capabilities into GitHub Pull Requests with no need to deploy websites. Free for up to 10 pages each month and 100MB of storage in total.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c421.title: Pendulums
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c421.content: Pendulums is a free time tracking tool that helps you manage your time in a better manner with an easy-to-use interface and valuable statistics.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c422.title: Pumble
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c422.content: Free team chat app. Unlimited users and message history, free forever.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c423.title: Raindrop.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c423.content: Private and secure bookmarking app for macOS, Windows, Android, iOS, and Web. Free Unlimited Bookmarks and Collaboration.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c424.title: element.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c424.content: A decentralized and open-source communication tool built on Matrix. Group chats, direct messaging, encrypted file transfers, voice and video chats, and easy integration with other services.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c425.title: Rocket.Chat
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c425.content: Open-source communication platform with Omnichannel features, Matrix Federation, Bridge with others apps, Unlimited messaging, and Full messaging history.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c426.title: seafile.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c426.content: Private or cloud storage, file sharing, sync, discussions. The cloud version has just 1 GB

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c427.title: Sema
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c427.content: Free developer portfolio tool able to consolidate and snapshot contributions across multiple repositories into a single report.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c428.title: Screen Sharing via Browser
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c428.content: Free screen sharing tool, share your screen with collabrators right from your browser, no download or registration needed. For free.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c429.title: Slab
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c429.content: A modern knowledge management service for teams. Free for up to 10 users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c42a.title: slack.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c42a.content: Free for unlimited users with some feature limitations

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c42b.title: Spectrum
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c42b.content: Create public or private communities for free.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c42c.title: StatusPile
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c42c.content: A status page of status pages. Could you track the status pages of your upstream providers?

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c42d.title: Stickies
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c42d.content: Visual collaboration app used for brainstorming, content curation, and notes. Free for up to 3 Walls, unlimited users, and 1 GB storage.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c42e.title: Stacks
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c42e.content: Content workspace with integrated notes, links, and file storage to navigate information overload. Forever free personal plan.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c42f.title: talky.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c42f.content: Free group video chat. Anonymous. Peer‑to‑peer. No plugins, signup, or payment required

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c430.title: Teamhood
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c430.content: Free Project, Task, and Issue-tracking software. Supports Kanban with Swimlanes and full Scrum implementation. Has integrated time tracking. Free for five users and three project portfolios.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c431.title: Teamplify
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c431.content: improve team development processes with Team Analytics and Smart Daily Standup. Includes full-featured Time Off management for remote-first teams. Free for small groups of up to 5 users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c432.title: Tefter
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c432.content: Bookmarking app with a powerful Slack integration. Free for open-source teams.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c433.title: TeleType
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c433.content: share terminals, voice, code, whiteboard, and more. no sign-in is required for end-to-end encrypted collaboration for developers.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c434.title: TimeCamp
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c434.content: Free time tracking software for unlimited users. Easily integrates with PM tools like Jira, Trello, Asana, etc.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c435.title: Huly
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c435.content: All-in-One Project Management Platform (alternative to Linear, Jira, Slack, Notion, Motion) - unlimited users, 10GB storage per workspace, 10GB video(audio) traffic.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c436.title: Teamcamp
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c436.content: All-in-one project management application for software development companies.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c437.title: twist.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c437.content: An asynchronous-friendly team communication app where conversations stay organized and on-topic. Free and Unlimited plans are available. Discounts are provided for eligible teams.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c438.title: tldraw.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c438.content: Free open-source white-boarding and diagramming tool with intelligent arrows, snapping, sticky notes, and SVG export features. Multiplayer mode for collaborative editing. Free official VS Code extension available as well.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c439.title: BookmarkOS.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c439.content: Free all-on-one bookmark manager, tab manager, and task manager in a customizable online desktop with folder collaboration.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c43a.title: typetalk.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c43a.content: Share and discuss ideas with your team through instant messaging on the web or your mobile

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c43b.title: Tugboat
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c43b.content: Preview every pull request, automated and on-demand. Free for all, complimentary Nano tier for non-profits.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c43c.title: whereby.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c43c.content: One-click video conversations, for free (formerly known as appear.in)

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c43d.title: windmill.dev
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c43d.content: Windmill is an open-source developer platform to quickly build production-grade multi-step automation and internal apps from minimal Python and Typescript scripts. As a free user, you can create and be a member of at most three non-premium workspaces.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c43e.title: vadoo.tv
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c43e.content: Video hosting and marketing made simple. Upload videos with a single click. Record, manage, share & more. The free tier provides up to 10 videos, 1 GB of storage, and 10 GB of bandwidth/per month

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c43f.title: userforge.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c43f.content: Interconnected online personas, user stories and context mapping.  Helps keep design and dev in sync free for up to 3 personas and two collaborators.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c440.title: wistia.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c440.content: Video hosting with viewer analytics, HD video delivery, and marketing tools to help understand your visitors, 25 videos, and Wistia branded player

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c441.title: wormhol.org
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c441.content: Straightforward file sharing service. Share unlimited files up to 5GB with as many peers as you want.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c442.title: Wormhole
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c442.content: Share files up to 5GB with end-to-end encryption for up to 24hours. For files larger than 5 GB, it uses peer-to-peer transfer to send your files directly.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c443.title: zoom.us
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c443.content: Secure Video and Web conferencing add-ons available. The free plan is limited to 40 minutes.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c444.title: Zulip
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c444.content: Real-time chat with a unique email-like threading model. The free plan includes 10,000 messages of search history and File storage up to 5 GB. also, it provides a self-hostable open-source version.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c445.title: robocorp.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c445.content: Open-source stack for powering Automation Ops. Try out Cloud features and implement simple automation for free. Robot work 240 min/month, 10 Assistant runs, Storage of 100 MB.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c446.title: Fleep.io

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c447.content: Chanty is another alternative to Slack. It has a free forever plan for small teams (up to 10) with unlimited public and private conversations, searchable history, unlimited 1:1 audio calls, unlimited voice messages, ten integrations, and 20 GB storage per team.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c448.title: ruttl.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c448.content: The best all-in-one feedback tool to collect digital feedback and review websites, PDFs, and images.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c449.title: Mattermost

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c44a.title: Webvizio
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c44a.content: Website feedback tool, website review software, and bug reporting tool for streamlining web development collaboration on tasks directly on live websites and web apps, images, PDFs, and design files.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c44b.title: Pullflow
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c44b.content: Pullflow offers an AI-enhanced platform for code review collaboration across GitHub, Slack, and VS Code.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c44c.title: Webex

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c44d.title: RingCentral
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c44d.content: Video meetings with a free plan offering 50 minutes per meeting with 100 participants.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c44e.title: GitBook
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c44e.content: Platform for capturing and documenting technical knowledge — from product docs to internal knowledge bases and APIs. Free plan for individual developers.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c44f.title: transfernow
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c44f.content: simplest, fastest and safest interface to transfer and share files. Send photos, videos and other large files without a manditory subscription.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c450.title: paste.sh
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c450.content: This is a JavaScript and the Crypto based simple paste site.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c451.title: Revolt.chat

They also have (official & unofficial) plugins support unlike most main-stream chatting applications.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c452.title: Tencent RTC
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c452.content: Tencent Real-Time Communication (TRTC) offers solutions for group audio/video calls.10,000 free minutes/month for the first year.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c453.title: Pastefy
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c453.content: Beautiful and simple Pastebin with optional Client-Encryption, Multitab-Pastes, an API, a highlighted Editor and more.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c454.title: SiteDots
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c454.content: Share feedback for website projects directly on your website, no emulation, canvas or workarounds. Completely functional free tier.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c455.title: acquia.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c455.content: Hosting for Drupal sites. Free tier for developers. Free development tools (such as Acquia Dev Desktop) are also available.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c457.title: Cosmic
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c457.content: Headless CMS and API toolkit. Free personal plans for developers.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c458.title: Crystallize

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c459.title: DatoCMS

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c45a.title: Directus

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c45b.title: FrontAid

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c45c.title: kontent.ai

You can use more detailed plans to meet your needs.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c45d.title: Prismic

Bigger free plans are available for Open Content/Open Source projects.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c45e.title: Sanity.io

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c45f.title: sensenet

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c460.title: TinaCMS

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c461.title: GatsbyjsCMS

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c462.title: Hygraph
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c462.content: Offers free tier for small projects. GraphQL first API. Move away from legacy solutions to the GraphQL native Headless CMS - and deliver omnichannel content API first.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c463.title: Squidex
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c463.content: Offers free tier for small projects. API / GraphQL first. Open source and based on event sourcing (versing every change automatically).

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c464.title: InstaWP
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c464.content: Launch a WordPress site in a few seconds. A free tier with 5 Active Sites, 500 MB Space, 48 hrs Site Expiry.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c465.title: Storyblok
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c465.content: A Headless CMS for developers and marketers that works with all modern frameworks. 67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c466.title: WPJack
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c466.content: Set up WordPress on any cloud in less than 5 minutes! The free tier includes 1 server, 2 sites, free SSL certificates, and unlimited cron jobs. No time limits or expirations—your website, your way.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c467.title: Appinvento
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c467.content: AppInvento is a free No code app builder. In the automatically generated backend code, users have complete access to the source code and unlimited APIs and routes, allowing for extensive integration. The free plan includes three projects, five tables, and a Google add-on.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c468.title: Cody AI
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c468.content: Cody is a coding AI assistant that uses AI and a deep understanding of your codebase to help you write and understand code faster. Cody gives developers a choice of LLMs (including local inference), has support for various IDEs, supports all popular programming languages, and has a free plan. The free plan gives developers 20 chat messages (using Claude 3 Sonnet as the LLM) and 500 autocompletions (using the Starcoder 16b) each month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c469.title: DhiWise

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c46a.title: Codeium

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c46b.title: Fern

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c46c.title: Metalama

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c46d.title: Supermaven
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c46d.content: Supermaven is a fast AI code completion plugin for VSCode, JetBrains, and Neovim. Free tier provides unlimited inline completions.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c46e.title: tabnine.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c46e.content: Tabnine helps developers create better software faster by providing insights learned from all the code in the world. Plugin available.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c46f.title: v0.dev

It generates copy-and-paste friendly React code based on shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS that people can use in their projects. Each generation takes at minimum 30 credits. You start up with 1200 credits, and get 200 free credits every month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c470.title: beanstalkapp.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c470.content: A complete workflow to write, review, and deploy code), a free account for one user, and one repository with 100 MB of storage

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c471.title: browserling.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c471.content: Live interactive cross-browser testing, free only 3 minutes sessions with MS IE 9 under Vista at 1024 x 768 resolution

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c472.title: codacy.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c472.content: Automated code reviews for PHP, Python, Ruby, Java, JavaScript, Scala, CSS, and CoffeeScript, free for unlimited public and private repositories

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c473.title: Codeac.io

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c474.title: CodeBeat
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c474.content: Automated Code Review Platform available for many languages. Free forever for public repositories with Slack and e-mail integration.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c475.title: codeclimate.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c475.content: Automated code review, free for Open Source and unlimited organisation-owned private repos (up to 4 collaborators). Also free for students and institutions.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c476.title: codecov.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c476.content: Code coverage tool (SaaS), free for Open Source and one free private repo

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c477.title: CodeFactor
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c477.content: Automated Code Review for Git. The free version includes unlimited users, public repositories, and one private repo.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c479.title: codescene.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c479.content: CodeScene prioritizes technical debt based on how the developers work with the code and visualizes organizational factors like team coupling and system mastery. Free for Open Source.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c47a.title: CodSpeed

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c47b.title: coveralls.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c47b.content: Display test coverage reports, free for Open Source

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c47c.title: dareboost
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c47c.content: 5 free analysis reports for web performance, accessibility, and security each month

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c47d.title: deepcode.ai

DeepCode's speed of analysis allows us to analyze your code in real time and deliver results when you hit the save button in your IDE. Supported languages are Java, C/C++, JavaScript, Python, and TypeScript. Integrations with GitHub, BitBucket, and GitLab. Free for open source and private repos and up to 30 developers.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c47e.title: deepscan.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c47e.content: Advanced static analysis for automatically finding runtime errors in JavaScript code, free for Open Source

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c47f.title: DeepSource

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c480.title: DiffText
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c480.content: Instantly find the differences between two blocks of code. Completely free to use.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c481.title: eversql.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c481.content: EverSQL - The #1 platform for database optimization. Gain critical insights into your database and SQL queries automatically.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c482.title: gerrithub.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c482.content: Gerrit code review for GitHub repositories for free

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c484.title: goreportcard.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c484.content: Code Quality for Go projects, free for Open Source

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c485.title: gtmetrix.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c485.content: Reports and thorough recommendations to optimize websites

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c486.title: holistic.dev

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c487.title: houndci.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c487.content: Comments on GitHub commits about code quality, free for Open Source

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c489.title: reviewable.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c489.content: Code review for GitHub repositories, free for public or personal repos.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c48a.title: parsers.dev
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c48a.content: Abstract syntax tree parsers and intermediate representation compilers as a service

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c48b.title: scan.coverity.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c48b.content: Static code analysis for Java, C/C++, C# and JavaScript, free for Open Source

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c48c.title: scrutinizer-ci.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c48c.content: Continuous inspection platform, free for Open Source

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c48d.title: semanticdiff.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c48d.content: Programming language aware diff for GitHub pull requests and commits, free for public repositories

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c48e.title: shields.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c48e.content: Quality metadata badges for open source projects

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c48f.title: sonarcloud.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c48f.content: Automated source code analysis for Java, JavaScript, C/C++, C#, VB.NET, PHP, Objective-C, Swift, Python, Groovy and even more languages, free for Open Source

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c490.title: SourceLevel
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c490.content: Automated Code Review and Team Analytics. Free for Open Source and organizations up to 5 collaborators.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c491.title: webceo.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c491.content: SEO tools but with also code verifications and different types of devices

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c492.title: zoompf.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c492.content: Fix the performance of your web sites, detailed analysis

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c493.title: libraries.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c493.content: Search and dependency update notifications for 32 different package managers, free for open source

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c494.title: Namae
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c494.content: Search various websites like GitHub, Gitlab, Heroku, Netlify, and many more for the availability of your project name.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c495.title: searchcode.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c495.content: Comprehensive text-based code search, free for Open Source

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c496.title: tickgit.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c496.content: Surfaces `TODO` comments (and other markers) to identify areas of code worth returning to for improvement.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c497.title: CodeKeep
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c497.content: Google Keep for Code Snippets. Organize, Discover, and share code snippets, featuring a powerful code screenshot tool with preset templates and a linking feature.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c498.title: AccessLint
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c498.content: AccessLint brings automated web accessibility testing into your development workflow. It's free for open source and education purposes.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c499.title: appcircle.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c499.content: An enterprise-grade mobile DevOps platform that automates the build, test, and publish store of mobile apps for faster, efficient release cycle. Free for 30 minutes max build time per build, 20 monthly builds and 1 concurrent build.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c49a.title: appveyor.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c49a.content: CD service for Windows, free for Open Source

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c49b.title: LocalOps

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c49c.title: Argonaut
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c49c.content: Deploy apps and infrastructure on your cloud in minutes. Support for custom and third-party app deployments on Kubernetes and Lambda environments. The free tier allows unlimited apps and deployments for 5 domains and 2 users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c49d.title: bitrise.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c49d.content: A CI/CD for mobile apps, native or hybrid. With 200 free builds/month 10 min build time and two team members. OSS projects get 45 min build time, +1 concurrency and unlimited team size.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c49e.title: buddy.works
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c49e.content: A CI/CD with five free projects and one concurrent run (120 executions/month)

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4a0.title: bytebase.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4a0.content: Database CI/CD and DevOps. Free under 20 users and ten database instances

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4a1.title: CircleCI
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4a1.content: Comprehensive free plan with all features included in a hosted CI/CD service for GitHub, GitLab, and BitBucket repositories. Multiple resource classes, Docker, Windows, Mac OS, ARM executors, local runners, test splitting, Docker Layer Caching, and other advanced CI/CD features. Free for up to 6000 minutes/month execution time, unlimited collaborators, 30 parallel jobs in private projects, and up to 80,000 free build minutes for Open Source projects.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4a4.title: codefresh.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4a4.content: Free-for-Life plan: 1 build, one environment, shared servers, unlimited public repos

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4a6.title: codeship.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4a6.content: 100 private builds/month, five private projects, unlimited for Open Source

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4a7.title: deploybot.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4a7.content: 1 repository with ten deployments, free for Open Source

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4a8.title: deployhq.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4a8.content: 1 project with ten daily deployments (30 build minutes/month)

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4a9.title: drone
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4a9.content: Drone Cloud enables developers to run Continuous Delivery pipelines across multiple architectures - including x86 and Arm (both 32-bit and 64-bit) - all in one place

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4aa.title: LayerCI
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4aa.content: CI for full stack projects. One full stack preview environment with 5GB memory & 3 CPUs.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ab.title: semaphoreci.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ab.content: Free for Open Source, 100 private builds per month

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ac.title: Squash Labs
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ac.content: creates a VM for each branch and makes your app available from a unique URL, Unlimited public & private repos, Up to 2 GB VM Sizes.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ae.title: Mergify
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ae.content: workflow automation and merge queue for GitHub — Free for public GitHub repositories

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4af.title: Make
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4af.content: The workflow automation tool lets you connect apps and automate workflows using UI. It supports many apps and the most popular APIs. Free for public GitHub repositories, and free tier with 100 Mb, 1000 Operations, and 15 minutes of minimum interval.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b0.title: Spacelift
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b0.content: Management platform for Infrastructure as Code. Free plan features: IaC collaboration, Terraform module registry, ChatOps integration, Continuous resource compliance with Open Policy Agent, SSO with SAML 2.0, and access to public worker pools: up to 200 minutes/month

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b1.title: microtica.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b1.content: Startup environments with ready-made infrastructure components, deploy apps on AWS for free, and support your production workloads. The free tier includes 1 Environment (on your AWS account), 2 Kubernetes Services, 100 build minutes per month, and 20 monthly deployments.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b2.title: Nx Cloud
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b2.content: Nx Cloud speeds up your monorepos on CI with features such as remote caching, distribution of tasks across machines and even automated splitting of your e2e test runs. It comes with a free plan for up to 30 contributors with generous 150k credits included.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b3.title: blacksmith
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b3.content: Managed performance runners for GitHub Actions that provides 3,000 free minutes per month, with no credit card needed.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b4.title: Terramate
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b4.content: Terramate is an orchestration and management platform for Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform, OpenTofu, and Terragrunt. Free up to 2 users including all features.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b5.title: Terrateam
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b5.content: GitOps-first Terraform automation with pull request-driven workflows, project isolation via self-hosted runners, and layered runs for ordered operations. Free for up to 3 users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b6.title: Applitools.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b6.content: Smart visual validation for web, native mobile and desktop apps. Integrates with almost all automation solutions (like Selenium and Karma) and remote runners (Sauce Labs, Browser Stack). free for open source. A free tier for a single user with limited checkpoints per week.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b7.title: Appetize
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b7.content: Test your Android & iOS apps on this Cloud Based Android Phone / Tablets emulator and iPhone/iPad simulators directly in your browser. The free tier includes two concurrent session with 30 minutes of usage per month. No limit on app size.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b8.title: Apptim
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b8.content: A mobile testing tool that enables people without performance engineering skills to evaluate an app's performance and user experience (UX). A desktop version using your own device is 100% FREE, with unlimited tests on both iOS and Android.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b9.title: Argos
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4b9.content: Open Source visual testing for developers. Unlimitedprojects, with 5,000 screenshots per month. Free for open-source projects.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ba.title: Bencher
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ba.content: A continuous benchmarking tool suite to catch CI performance regressions. Free for all public projects.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4bb.title: browserstack.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4bb.content: Manual and automated browser testing, [free for Open Source](https://www.browserstack.com/open-source?ref=pricing)

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4bc.title: BugBug
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4bc.content: Lightweight test automation tool for web applications. It is easy to learn and doesn't require coding. You can run unlimited tests on your own computer for free. You also get cloud monitoring and CI/CD integration for an additional monthly fee.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4bd.title: Checkly
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4bd.content: Code-first synthetic monitoring for modern DevOps. Monitor your APIs and apps at a fraction of the price of legacy providers. Powered by a Monitoring as Code workflow and Playwright. Generous free tier for devs.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4be.title: checkbot.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4be.content: Browser extension that tests if your website follows 50+ SEO, speed and security best practices. Free tier for smaller websites.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4bf.title: CORS-Tester
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4bf.content: A free tool for developers and API testers to check if an API is CORS-enabled for a given domain and identify gaps. Get actionable insights.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c0.title: cypress.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c0.content: Fast, easy and reliable testing for anything that runs in a browser. Cypress Test Runner is always free and open-source with no restrictions and limitations. Cypress Dashboard is free for open-source projects for up to 5 users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c1.title: Cypress Recorder by Preflight
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c1.content: Create AI-powered Cypress Tests/POM models on your browser. It's open-source, except for the AI part. It's free for five monthly test creations with Self-healing scripts, Email, and Visual testing.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c2.title: everystep-automation.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c2.content: Records and replays all steps made in a web browser and creates scripts, free with fewer options

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c3.title: Gremlin
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c3.content: Gremlin's Chaos Engineering tools allow you to safely and securely inject failure into your systems to find weaknesses before they cause customer-facing issues. Gremlin Free provides access to Shutdown and CPU attacks on up to 5 hosts or containers.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c4.title: gridlastic.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c4.content: Selenium Grid testing with a free plan of up to 4 simultaneous selenium nodes/10 grid starts/4,000 test minutes/month

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c5.title: katalon.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c5.content: Provides a testing platform that can help teams of all sizes at different levels of testing maturity, including  Katalon Studio, TestOps (+ Visual Testing free), TestCloud, and Katalon Recorder.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c6.title: Keploy
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c6.content: Keploy is a functional testing toolkit for developers. Recording API calls generates E2E tests for APIs (KTests) and mocks or stubs(KMocks). It is free for Open Source projects.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c7.title: knapsackpro.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c7.content: Speed up your tests with optimal test suite parallelization on any CI provider. Split Ruby, JavaScript tests on parallel CI nodes to save time. Free plan for up to 10 minutes of test files and free unlimited plan for Open Source projects.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c8.title: lambdatest.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c8.content: Manual, visual, screenshot, and automated browser testing on selenium and cypress, [free for Open Source](https://www.lambdatest.com/open-source-cross-browser-testing-tool)

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c9.title: loadmill.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4c9.content: Automatically create API and load tests by analyzing network traffic. Simulate up to 50 concurrent users for up to 60 minutes for free monthly.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ca.title: lost-pixel.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ca.content: holistic visual regression testing for your Storybook, Ladle, Histoire stories and Web Apps. Unlimited team members, totally free for open-source, 7,000 snapshots/month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4cb.title: octomind.dev
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4cb.content: Auto-generated, run and maintained Playwright UI tests with AI-assisted test case generation

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4cc.title: percy.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4cc.content: Add visual testing to any web app, static site, style guide, or component library.  Unlimited team members, Demo app, and unlimited projects, 5,000 snapshots/month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4cd.title: preflight.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4cd.content: No-code automated web testing. Record tests on your browser that are resilient to UI changes and run them on Windows machines. Could you integrate with your CI/CD? The free plan includes 50 monthly test runs with video, HTML sessions, and more.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ce.title: qase.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ce.content: Test management system for Dev and QA teams. Manage test cases, compose test runs, perform tests, track defects, and measure impact. The free tier includes all core features, with 500MB available for attachments and up to 3 users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d1.title: seotest.me
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d1.content: Free on-page SEO website tester. 10 free website crawls per day. Useful SEO learning resources and recommendations on how to improve the on-page SEO results for any website regardless of technology.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d2.title: snippets.uilicious.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d2.content: It's like CodePen but for cross-browser testing. UI-licious lets you write tests like user stories and offers a free platform - UI-licious Snippets - that allows you to run unlimited tests on Chrome with no sign-up required for up to 3 minutes per test run. Found a bug? You can copy the unique URL to your test to show your devs exactly how to reproduce the bug.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d3.title: TestCollab
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d3.content: A user-friendly test management software, its free plan includes Jira integration, unlimited projects, test case import using CSV/XLSx, time tracking, and 1 GB file storage.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d4.title: testingbot.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d4.content: Selenium Browser and Device Testing, [free for Open Source](https://testingbot.com/open-source)

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d5.title: Testspace.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d5.content: A Dashboard for publishing automated test results and a Framework for implementing manual tests as code using GitHub. The service is [free for Open Source](https://github.com/marketplace/testspace-com) and accounts for 450 monthly results.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d6.title: tesults.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d6.content: Test results reporting and test case management. Integrates with popular test frameworks. Open Source software developers, individuals, educators, and small teams getting started can request discounted and free offerings beyond basic free projects.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d7.title: UseWebhook.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d7.content: Capture and inspect webhooks from your browser. Forward to localhost, or replay from history. Free to use.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d8.title: Vaadin
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d8.content: Build scalable UIs in Java or TypeScript, and use the integrated tooling, components, and design system to iterate faster, design better, and simplify the development process. Unlimited Projects with five years of free maintenance.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d9.title: websitepulse.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4d9.content: Various free network and server tools.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4da.title: webhook-test.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4da.content: Debug and inspect webhooks and HTTP requests with a unique URL during integration. Completely free, you can create unlimited URLs and receive recommendations.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4db.title: webhook.site
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4db.content: Verify webhooks, outbound HTTP requests, or emails with a custom URL. A temporary URL and email address are always free.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4dc.title: webhookbeam.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4dc.content: Set up webhooks and monitor them via push notifications and emails.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4dd.title: aikido.dev
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4dd.content: All-in-one appsec platform covering SCA, SAST, CSPM, DAST, Secrets, IaC, Malware, Container scanning, EOL,... Free plan includes two users, scanning of 10 repos, 1 cloud, 2 containers & 1 domain.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4de.title: alienvault.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4de.content: Uncovers compromised systems in your network

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4df.title: Altcha.org
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4df.content: A Spam Filter for websites and APIs powered by natural language processing and machine learning. Free plan includes 200 requests a day per domain.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e0.title: atomist.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e0.content: A quicker and more convenient way to automate various development tasks. Now in beta.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e1.title: cloudsploit.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e1.content: Amazon Web Services (AWS) security and compliance auditing and monitoring

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e2.title: Public Cloud Threat Intelligence
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e2.content: High confidence Indicator of Compromise(IOC) targeting public cloud infrastructure, A portion is available on github (https://github.com/unknownhad/AWSAttacks). Full list is available via API

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e3.title: CodeNotary.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e3.content: Open Source platform with indelible proof to notarize code, files, directories, or container

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e4.title: crypteron.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e4.content: Cloud-first, developer-friendly security platform prevents data breaches in .NET and Java applications

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e5.title: CyberChef
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e5.content: A simple, intuitive web app for analyzing and decoding/encoding data without dealing with complex tools or programming languages. Like a Swiss army knife of cryptography & encryption. All features are free to use, with no limit. Open source if you wish to self-host.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e6.title: DAS
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e6.content: Styra DAS Free, Full lifecycle policy management to create, deploy and manage Open Policy Agent(OPA) authorization

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e7.title: Datree
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e7.content: Open Source CLI tool to prevent Kubernetes misconfigurations by ensuring that manifests and Helm charts follow best practices as well as your organization's policies

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e9.title: DJ Checkup
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4e9.content: Scan your Django site for security flaws with this free, automated checkup tool. Forked from the Pony Checkup site.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ea.title: Doppler
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ea.content: Universal Secrets Manager for application secrets and config, with support for syncing to various cloud providers. Free for five users with basic access controls.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4eb.title: Dotenv
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4eb.content: Sync your .env files, quickly & securely. Stop sharing your .env files over insecure channels like Slack and email, and never lose an important .env file again. Free for up to 3 teammates.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ec.title: GitGuardian
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ec.content: Keep secrets out of your source code with automated secrets detection and remediation. Scan your git repos for 350+ types of secrets and sensitive files – Free for individuals and teams of 25 developers or less.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ed.title: Have I been pwned?
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ed.content: REST API for fetching the information on the breaches.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ee.title: hostedscan.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ee.content: Online vulnerability scanner for web applications, servers, and networks. Ten free scans per month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ef.title: Infisical
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ef.content: Open source platform that lets you manage developer secrets across your team and infrastructure: everywhere from local development to staging/production 3rd-party services. Free for up to 5 developers.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f0.title: Internet.nl
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f0.content: Test for modern Internet Standards like IPv6, DNSSEC, HTTPS, DMARC, STARTTLS and DANE

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f1.title: keychest.net
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f1.content: SSL expiry management and cert purchase with an integrated CT database

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f2.title: letsencrypt.org
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f2.content: Free SSL Certificate Authority with certs trusted by all major browsers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f3.title: meterian.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f3.content: Monitor Java, Javascript, .NET, Scala, Ruby, and NodeJS projects for security vulnerabilities in dependencies. Free for one private project, unlimited projects for open source.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f4.title: Mozilla Observatory
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f4.content: Find and fix security vulnerabilities in your site.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f5.title: opswat.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f5.content: Security Monitoring of computers, devices, applications, configurations, Free 25 users and 30 days history users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f6.title: openapi.security
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f6.content: Free tool to quickly check the security of any OpenAPI / Swagger-based API. You don't need to sign up.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f7.title: pixee.ai
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f7.content: Automated Product Security Engineer as a free GitHub bot that submits PRs to your Java code base to automatically resolve vulnerabilities. Other languages coming soon!

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f8.title: pyup.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f8.content: Monitor Python dependencies for security vulnerabilities and update them automatically. Free for one private project, unlimited projects for open source.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f9.title: qualys.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4f9.content: Find web app vulnerabilities, audit for OWASP Risks

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4fb.title: ringcaptcha.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4fb.content: Tools to use the phone number as id, available for free

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4fc.title: seclookup.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4fc.content: Seclookup APIs can enrich domain threat indicators in SIEM, provide comprehensive information on domain names, and improve threat detection & response. Get 50K lookups free [here](https://account.seclookup.com/).

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4fd.title: snyk.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4fd.content: Can find and fix known security vulnerabilities in your open-source dependencies. Unlimited tests and remediation for open-source projects. Limited to 200 tests/month for your private projects.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4fe.title: ssllabs.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4fe.content: Intense analysis of the configuration of any SSL web server

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ff.title: SOOS
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c4ff.content: Free, unlimited SCA scans for open-source projects. Detect and fix security threats before release. Protect your projects with a simple and effective solution.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c501.title: Sucuri SiteCheck
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c501.content: Free website security check and malware scanner

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c502.title: Protectumus
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c502.content: Free website security check, site antivirus, and server firewall (WAF) for PHP. Email notifications for registered users in the free tier.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c503.title: TestTLS.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c503.content: Test an SSL/TLS service for secure server configuration, certificates, chains, etc. Not limited to HTTPS.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c504.title: threatconnect.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c504.content: Threat intelligence: It is designed for individual researchers, analysts, and organizations starting to learn about cyber threat intelligence. Free up to 3 Users

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c505.title: tinfoilsecurity.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c505.content: Automated vulnerability scanning. The free plan allows weekly XSS scans

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c506.title: Ubiq Security
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c506.content: Encrypt and decrypt data with three lines of code and automatic key management. Free for one application and up to 1,000,000 encryptions per month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c507.title: Virgil Security
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c507.content: Tools and services for implementing end-to-end encryption, database protection, IoT security, and more in your digital solution. Free for applications with up to 250 users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c508.title: Vulert
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c508.content: Vulert continuously monitors your open-source dependencies for new vulnerabilities, recommends fixes, without requiring installation or access to your codebase. Free for open-source projects.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c509.title: Escape GraphQL Quickscan
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c509.content: One-click security scan of your GraphQL endpoints. Free, no login required.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c50a.title: HasMySecretLeaked
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c50a.content: Search across 20 million exposed secrets in public GitHub repositories, gists, issues,and comments for Free

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c50b.title: Project Gatekeeper
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c50b.content: An All-in-One SSL Toolkit Offering various features like Private Key & CSR Generator, SSL Certificate Decoder, Certificate Matcher and Order SSL Certificate. We offer the users to generate Free SSL Certificates from Let's Encrypt, Google Trust and BuyPass using CNAME Records rather than TXT Records.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c50c.title: Aserto
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c50c.content: Fine-grained authorization as a service for applications and APIs. Free up to 1000 MAUs and 100 authorizer instances.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c50d.title: asgardeo.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c50d.content: Seamless Integration of SSO, MFA, passwordless auth and more. Includes SDKs for frontend and backend apps. Free up to 1000 MAUs and five identity providers.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c50e.title: Auth0
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c50e.content: Hosted SSO. The free plan includes 25,000 MAUs, unlimited Social Connections, a custom domain, and more.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c50f.title: Authgear
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c50f.content: Bring Passwordless, OTPs, 2FA, SSO to your apps in minutes. All Front-end included. Free up to 5000 MAUs.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c510.title: Authress
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c510.content: Authentication login and access control, unlimited identity providers for any project. Facebook, Google, Twitter and more. The first 1000 API calls are free.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c511.title: Authy
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c511.content: Two-factor authentication (2FA) on multiple devices, with backups. Drop-in replacement for Google Authenticator. Free for up to 100 successful authentications.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c512.title: Cerbos Hub
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c512.content: A complete authorization management system for authoring, testing, and deploying access policies. Fine-grained authorization and access control, free up to 100 monthly active principals.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c513.title: Clerk
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c513.content: User management, authentication, 2FA/MFA, prebuilt UI components for sign-in, sign-up, user profiles, and more. Free up to 10,000 monthly active users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c514.title: Cloud-IAM
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c514.content: Keycloak Identity and Access Management as a Service. Free up to 100 users and one realm.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c515.title: Corbado
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c515.content: Add passkey-first authentication to new or existing apps. Free for unlimited MAUs.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c516.title: Descope
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c516.content: Highly customizable AuthN flows, has both a no-code and API/SDK approach, Free 7,500 active users/month, 50 tenants (up to 5 SAML/SSO tenants).

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c517.title: duo.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c517.content: Two-factor authentication (2FA) for website or app. Free for ten users, all authentication methods, unlimited, integrations, hardware tokens.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c518.title: Kinde
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c518.content: Simple, robust authentication you can integrate with your product in minutes.  Everything you need to get started with 7,500 free MAU.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c519.title: logintc.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c519.content: Two-factor authentication (2FA) by push notifications, free for ten users, VPN, Websites, and SSH

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c51a.title: MojoAuth
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c51a.content: MojoAuth makes it easy to implement Passwordless authentication on your web, mobile, or any application in minutes.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c51b.title: Okta
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c51b.content: User management, authentication and authorization. Free for up to 100 monthly active users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c51c.title: onelogin.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c51c.content: Identity as a Service (IDaaS), Single Sign-On Identity Provider, Cloud SSO IdP, three company apps, and five personal apps, unlimited users

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c51d.title: Ory
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c51d.content: AuthN/AuthZ/OAuth2.0/Zero Trust managed security platform. Forever free developer accounts with all security features, unlimited team members, 200 daily active users, and 25k/mo permission checks.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c51e.title: Permit.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c51e.content: Auhtorization-as-a-service provider platform enabling RBAC, ABAC, and ReBAC for scalable microservices with real-time updates and a no-code policy UI. A 1000 Monthly Active User free tier.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c51f.title: Phase Two
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c51f.content: Keycloak Open Source Identity and Access Management. Free realm up to 1000 users, up to 10 SSO connections, leveraging Phase Two's Keycloak enhanced container which includes the [Organization](https://phasetwo.io/product/organizations/) extension.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c520.title: SSOJet
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c520.content: Add Enterprise SSO Without Rebuilding Your Auth. The free plan includes unlimited monthly active users, unlimited organizations, 2 SSO & 2 SCIM connections.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c521.title: Stytch
