67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c59d.content: Evals, prompt playground, and data management for Gen AI. Free plan gives upto 1,000 private eval rows/week.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c59e.title: Findr
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c59e.content: Universal search that lets you search all your apps, at once. Search assistant that lets you answer questions using your information. Free plan offers unlimited unified search and 5 co daily co pilot queries.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c59f.title: ReportGPT
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c59f.content: AI Powered Writing Assistant. The entire platform is free as long as you bring your own API key.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a0.title: Clair
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a0.content: Clinical AI Reference. Students have free access to the professional tool suite, which includes Open Search, Clinical Summary, Med Review, Drug Interactions, ICD-10 Codes, and Stewardship. Additionally, a free trial for the professional suite is available.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a1.title: Langtrace
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a1.content: enables developers to trace, evaluate, manage prompts and datasets, and debug issues related to an LLM application's performance. It creates open telemetry standard traces for any LLM which helps with observability and works with any observability client. Free plan offers 50K traces/month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a2.title: LangWatch
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a2.content: A LLMOps platform helping AI teams measure, monitor, and optimize LLM applications for reliability, cost-efficiency, and performance. With a powerful DSPy component, we enable seamless collaboration between engineers and non-technical teams to fine-tune and productionize GenAI products. Free plan includes all platform features, 1k traces/month and 1 workflow DSPy optimizers. [#opensource](https://github.com/langwatch/langwatch)

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a3.title: Ultra AI
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a3.content: AI command center for your product. Features include multi-provider AI gateway, prompts manager, caching, logs, analytics, model fallbacks and user rate limiting. Free forever plan offers 10k+ requests per month and all the features except caching.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a4.title: Comet Opik
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a4.content: Evaluate, test, and ship LLM applications across your dev and production lifecycles. [#opensource](https://github.com/comet-ml/opik/)

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a5.title: Langfuse
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a5.content: Open-source LLM engineering platform that helps teams collaboratively debug, analyze, and iterate on their LLM applications. Free forever plan includes 50k observations per month and all platform features. [#opensource](https://github.com/langfuse/langfuse)

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a6.title: Pollinations.AI
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a6.content: easy-to-use, free image generation AI with free API available. No signups or API keys required, and several option for integrating into a website or workflow. [#opensource](https://github.com/pollinations/pollinations)

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a7.title: Othor AI
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a7.content: An AI-native fast, simple, and secure alternative to popular business intelligence solutions like Tableau, Power BI, and Looker. Othor utilizes large language models (LLMs) to deliver custom business intelligence solutions in minutes. The Free Forever plan provides one workspace with five datasource connections for one user, with no limits on analytics. [#opensource](https://github.com/othorai/othor.ai)

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a8.title: OpenRouter
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a8.content: Provides various free AI models including DeepSeek R1, V3, Llama, and Moonshot AI. These models excel in natural language processing and are suitable for diverse development needs. Note that while these models are free to use, they are subject to rate limits. Additionally, OpenRouter offers paid models for more advanced requirements, for instance Claude, OpenAI, Grok, Gemini, and Nova.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a9.title: bootstrapcdn.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5a9.content: CDN for bootstrap, bootswatch and fontawesome.io

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5aa.title: cdnjs.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5aa.content: Simple. Fast. Reliable. Content delivery at its finest. cdnjs is a free and open-source CDN service trusted by over 11% of all websites, powered by Cloudflare.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ab.title: developers.google.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ab.content: The Google Hosted Libraries is a content distribution network for the most popular Open Source JavaScript libraries

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ac.title: Stellate
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ac.content: Stellate is a blazing-fast, reliable CDN for your GraphQL API and free for two services.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ad.title: jsdelivr.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ad.content: A free, fast, and reliable open-source CDN. Supports npm, GitHub, WordPress, Deno, and more.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ae.title: Microsoft Ajax
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ae.content: The Microsoft Ajax CDN hosts popular third-party JavaScript libraries such as jQuery and enables you to easily add them to your Web application

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5af.title: ovh.ie
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5af.content: Free DDoS protection and SSL certificate

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5b0.title: Skypack
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5b0.content: The 100% Native ES Module JavaScript CDN. Free for 1 million requests per domain per month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5b1.title: raw.githack.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5b1.content: A modern replacement of **rawgit.com** which simply hosts file using Cloudflare

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5b2.title: section.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5b2.content: A simple way to spin up and manage a complete Varnish Cache solution. Supposedly free forever for one site

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5b3.title: statically.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5b3.content: CDN for Git repos (GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket), WordPress-related assets, and images

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5b4.title: toranproxy.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5b4.content: Proxy for Packagist and GitHub. Never fail CD. Free for personal use, one developer, no support

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5b6.title: weserv
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5b6.content: An image cache & resize service. Manipulate images on the fly with a worldwide cache.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5b9.title: CacheFly
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5b9.content: Up to 5 TB per month of Free CDN traffic, 19 Core PoPs , 1 Domain and Universal SSL.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ba.title: anvil.works
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ba.content: Web app development with nothing but Python. Free tier with unlimited apps and 30-second timeouts.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5bb.title: appwrite
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5bb.content: Unlimited projects with no project pausing (supports websockets) and authentication service. 1 Database, 3 Buckets, 5 Functions per project in free tier.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5bc.title: configure.it
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5bc.content: Mobile app development platform, free for two projects, limited features but no resource limits

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5bd.title: codenameone.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5bd.content: Open source, cross-platform, mobile app development toolchain for Java/Kotlin developers. Free for commercial use with an unlimited number of projects

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5be.title: deco.cx
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5be.content: Edge-native frontend platform with a visual CMS auto-generated from TypeScript code. Built-in A/B testing, content segmentation, and real-time analytics. Perfect for content-heavy and Enterprise e-commerce websites. Free up to 5k pageviews/month or open-source/personal projects.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5bf.title: Deno Deploy
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5bf.content: Distributed system that runs JavaScript, TypeScript, and WebAssembly at the edge worldwide. The free tier includes 100,000 requests per day and 100 GiB data transfers per month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c1.title: encore.dev
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c1.content: Backend framework using static analysis to provide automatic infrastructure, boilerplate-free code, and more. Includes free cloud hosting for hobby projects.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c2.title: flightcontrol.dev
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c2.content: Deploy web services, databases, and more on your own AWS account with a Git push style workflow. Free tier for users with 1 developer on personal GitHub repos. AWS costs are billed through AWS, but you can use credits and the AWS free tier.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c3.title: gigalixir.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c3.content: Gigalixir provides one free instance that never sleeps and a free-tier PostgreSQL database limited to 2 connections, 10, 000 rows and no backups for Elixir/Phoenix apps.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c4.title: Glitch
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c4.content: Free public hosting with code sharing and real-time collaboration features. The free plan has a 1000-hours/month limit.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c5.title: Lade
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c5.content: Lade is a cloud platform built for developers. The free tier includes three services, which can be either apps or databases. Each service includes 128 MB RAM and 1 GB storage.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c6.title: pipedream.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c6.content: An integration platform built for developers. Develop any workflow based on any trigger. Workflows are code you can run [for free](https://docs.pipedream.com/pricing/). No server or cloud resources to manage.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c7.title: pythonanywhere.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c7.content: Cloud Python app hosting. Beginner account is free, 1 Python web application at your-username.pythonanywhere.com domain, 512 MB private file storage, one MySQL database

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c8.title: ampt.dev
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c8.content: Ampt lets teams build, deploy, and scale JavaScript apps on AWS without complicated configs or managing infrastructure. Free Preview plan includes 500 invocations hourly, 2,500 invocations daily and 50,000 invocations monthly. Custom domains are allowed only in the paid plans.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c9.title: Koyeb
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5c9.content: Koyeb is a developer-friendly serverless platform to deploy apps globally. Seamlessly run Docker containers, web apps, and APIs with git-based deployment, native autoscaling, a global edge network, and built-in service mesh and discovery. Free Instance lets you deploy a web service in Frankfurt, Germany or Washington, D.C., US. Free Managed Postgres database available in Frankfurt (Germany), Washington, D.C. (US), and Singapore. 512MB memory, 2GB storage, and 0.1 CPU. No credit card is required to get started.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ca.title: Napkin
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ca.content: FaaS with 500Mb of memory, a default timeout of 15 seconds, and 5,000 free API calls/month rate-limited to 5 calls/second.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5cb.title: Meteor Cloud
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5cb.content: Galaxy hosting. Meteor's platform-as-a-service for Meteor apps includes free MongoDB Shared Hosting and automatic SSL.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5cc.title: Northflank
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5cc.content: Build and deploy microservices, jobs, and managed databases with a powerful UI, API & CLI. Seamlessly scale containers from version control and external Docker registries. The free tier includes two services, two cron jobs and 1 database.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5cd.title: YepCode
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5cd.content: All-in-one platform to connect APIs and services in a serverless environment. It brings all the agility and benefits of NoCode tools but with all the power of using programming languages. The free tier includes [1.000 yeps](https://yepcode.io/pricing/).

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ce.title: WunderGraph
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ce.content: An open-source platform that allows you to  quickly build, ship and manage modern APIs. Built-in CI/CD, GitHub integration, and automatic HTTPS. Up to 3 projects, 1GB egress, 300 minutes of build time per month on the [free plan](https://wundergraph.com/pricing)

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5cf.title: Zeabur
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5cf.content: Deploy your services with one click. Free for three services, with US$ 5 free credits per month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d0.title: mogenius
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d0.content: Easily build, deploy, and run services on Kubernetes. The free tier supports connecting a local Kubernetes with mogenius, enabling individual developers to create a production-like test environment on their machine.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d1.title: genezio
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d1.content: A serverless function provider offers 1 million function calls, 100GB of bandwidth, and 10 cron jobs per month for free, exclusively for non-commercial or academic use.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d2.title: Activepieces
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d2.content: Build automation flows to connect several apps together in your app's backend. For example, send a Slack message or add a Google Sheet row when an event fires in your app. Free up to 5,000 tasks per month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d3.title: back4app.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d3.content: Back4App is an easy-to-use, flexible and scalable backend based on Parse Platform.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d4.title: backendless.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d4.content: Mobile and Web Baas, with 1 GB file storage free, push notifications of 50,000/month, and 1000 data objects in the table.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d5.title: bismuth.cloud
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d5.content: Our AI will boostrap your Python API on our function runtime and hosted storage, build and host for free in our online editor or locally with your favorite tools.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d6.title: BMC Developer Program
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d6.content: The BMC Developer Program provides documentation and resources to build and deploy digital innovations for your enterprise. Access to a comprehensive, personal sandbox that includes the platform, SDK, and a library of components that can be used to build and tailor apps.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d7.title: connectycube.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d7.content: Unlimited chat messages, p2p voice & video calls, files attachments and push notifications. Free for apps up to 1000 users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d8.title: convex.dev
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d8.content: Reactive backend as a service, hosting your data (documents with relationships & serializable ACID transactions), serverless functions, and WebSockets to stream updates to various clients. Free for small projects - up to 1M records, 5M monthly function calls.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d9.title: darklang.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5d9.content: Hosted language combined with editor and infrastructure. Accessible during the beta, a generous free tier is planned after beta.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5da.title: Firebase
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5da.content: Firebase helps you build and run successful apps. Free Spark Plan offers Authentication, Hosting, Firebase ML, Realtime Database, Cloud Storage, Testlab. A/B Testing, Analytics, App Distribution, App Indexing, Cloud Messaging (FCM), Crashlytics, Dynamic Links, In-App Messaging, Performance Monitoring, Predictions, and Remote Config are always free.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5db.title: Flutter Flow
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5db.content: Build your Flutter App UI without writing a single line of code. Also has a Firebase integration. The free plan includes full access to UI Builder and Free templates.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5dc.title: getstream.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5dc.content: Build scalable In-App Chat, Messaging, Video and audio, and Feeds in a few hours instead of weeks

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5dd.title: hasura.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5dd.content: Hasura extends your existing databases wherever it is hosted and provides an instant GraphQL API that can be securely accessed for web, mobile, and data integration workloads. Free for 1GB/month of data pass-through.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5de.title: iron.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5de.content: Async task processing (like AWS Lambda) with free tier and 1-month free trial

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5df.title: nhost.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5df.content: Serverless backend for web and mobile apps. The free plan includes PostgreSQL, GraphQL (Hasura), Authentication, Storage, and Serverless Functions.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e0.title: onesignal.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e0.content: Unlimited free push notifications. 10,000 email sends per month, with unlimited contacts and access to Auto Warm Up.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e1.title: paraio.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e1.content: Backend service API with flexible authentication, full-text search and caching. Free for one app, 1GB of app data.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e2.title: progress.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e2.content: Mobile backend, starter plan has unlimited requests/second, with 1 GB of data storage. Enterprise application support

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e3.title: pubnub.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e3.content: Free push notifications for up to 1 million messages/month and 100 active daily devices

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e4.title: pushbots.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e4.content: Push notification service. Free for up to 1.5 million pushes/month

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e5.title: pushcrew.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e5.content: Push notification service. Unlimited notifications for up to 2,000 Subscribers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e6.title: pusher.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e6.content: Free, unlimited push notifications for 2000 monthly active users. A single API for iOS and Android devices.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e7.title: quickblox.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e7.content: A communication backend for instant messaging, video, and voice calling, and push notifications

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e8.title: restspace.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e8.content: Configure a server with services for auth, data, files, email API, templates, and more, then compose into pipelines and transform data.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e9.title: Salesforce Developer Program
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5e9.content: Build apps Lightning fast with drag-and-drop tools. Customize your data model with clicks. Go further with Apex code. Integrate with anything using powerful APIs. Stay protected with enterprise-grade security. Customize UI with clicks or any leading-edge web framework. Free Developer Program gives access to the full Lightning Platform.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ea.title: ServiceNow Developer Program
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ea.content: Rapidly build, test, and deploy applications that make work better for your organization. Free Instance & access to early previews.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5eb.title: simperium.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5eb.content: Move data everywhere instantly and automatically, multi-platform, unlimited sending and storage of structured data, max. 2,500 users/month

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ec.title: Singlebase.cloud
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ec.content: SinglebaseCloud is an AI-powered all-in-one backend platform to accelerate app development. It offers tools like Vector DB, Relational Document DB, Auth, Search, and Storage, aiming to simplify backend development. Free/Starter Plan offers Relational Document DB, Auth, Search, Storage.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ed.title: stackstorm.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ed.content: Event-driven automation for apps, services, and workflows, free without flow, access control, LDAP

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ee.title: streamdata.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ee.content: Turns any REST API into an event-driven streaming API. Free plan up to 1 million messages and ten concurrent connections.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ef.title: Supabase
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ef.content: The Open Source Firebase Alternative to build backends. Free Plan offers Authentication, Realtime Database & Object Storage.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f0.title: tyk.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f0.content: API management with authentication, quotas, monitoring and analytics. Free cloud offering

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f1.title: zapier.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f1.content: Connect the apps you use to automate tasks. Five zaps every 15 minutes and 100 tasks/month

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f2.title: IFTTT
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f2.content: Automate your favorite apps and devices. Free 2 Applets

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f3.title: Integrately
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f3.content: Automate tedious tasks with a single click. Free 100 Tasks, 15 Minute

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f4.title: LeanCloud
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f4.content: Mobile backend. 1GB of data storage, 256MB instance, 3K API requests/day, and 10K pushes/day are free. (API is very similar to Parse Platform)

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f5.title: Clappia
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f5.content: A low-code platform designed for building business process applications with customizable mobile and web apps. Offers a drag-and-drop interface, features like Offline Support, real-time location tracking and integration with various third-party services.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f6.title: Basedash
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f6.content: Low-code platform for building internal admin panels and dashboards. Supports SQL databases and REST APIs.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f7.title: BudiBase
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f7.content: Budibase is an open-source low-code platform for creating internal apps in minutes. Supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, MSSQL, MongoDB, Rest API, Docker, K8s

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f8.title: appsmith
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f8.content: Low code project to build admin panels, internal tools, and dashboards. Integrates with 15+ databases and any API.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f9.title: ToolJet
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5f9.content: Extensible low-code framework for building business applications. Connect to databases, cloud storages, GraphQL, API endpoints, Airtable, etc., and build apps using drag-and-drop application builder.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5fa.title: ReTool
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5fa.content: Low-code platform for building internal applications. Retool is highly hackable. If you can write it with JavaScript and an API, you can make it in Retool. The free tier allows up to five users per month, unlimited apps and API connections.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5fb.title: DronaHQ
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5fb.content: DronaHQ - a low code platform that helps engineering teams and product managers to build internal tools, custom user journeys, digital experiences, automation, custom admin panels, operational apps 10X faster.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5fc.title: ILLA Cloud
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5fc.content: ILLA Cloud - A robust open-source low-code platform for developers to build internal tools. By using ILLA's library of Components and Actions, developers can save massive amounts of time on building tools. Free for 5 team members.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5fd.title: outsystems.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5fd.content: Enterprise web development PaaS for on-premise or cloud, free "personal environment" offering allows for unlimited code and up to 1 GB database

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5fe.title: UI Bakery
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5fe.content: Low-code platform that enables faster building of custom web applications. Supports building UI using drag and drop with a high level of customization through JavaScript, Python, and SQL. Available as both cloud and self-hosted solutions. Free for up to 5 users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ff.title: Mendix
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c5ff.content: Rapid Application Development for Enterprises, unlimited accessible sandbox environments supporting total users, 0.5 GB storage and 1 GB RAM per app. Also, Studio and Studio Pro IDEs are allowed in the free tier.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c600.title: lil'bots
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c600.content: write and run scripts online utlizing free built-in APIs like OpenAI, Anthropic, Firecrawl and others. Great for building AI agents / internal tooling and sharing with team. Free-tier includes full access to APIs, AI coding assistant and 10,000 execution credits / month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c601.title: Alwaysdata
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c601.content: 100 MB free web hosting with support for MySQL, PostgreSQL, CouchDB, MongoDB, PHP, Python, Ruby, Node.js, Elixir, Java, Deno, custom web servers, access via FTP, WebDAV and SSH; mailbox, mailing list and app installer included.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c602.title: Awardspace.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c602.content: Free web hosting + a free short domain, PHP, MySQL, App Installer, Email Sending & No Ads.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c603.title: Bohr
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c603.content: Free for non commercial projects + Developer-First Deployment and Development Platform that minimizes infrastructure hassle and speed up setup.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c604.title: Bubble
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c604.content: Visual programming to build web and mobile apps without code, free with Bubble branding.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c605.title: dAppling Network
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c605.content: Decentralized web hosting platform for Web3 frontends focusing on increasing uptime and security and providing an additional access point for users.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c606.title: DigitalOcean
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c606.content: Build and deploy three static sites for free on the App Platform Starter tier.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c607.title: Drive To Web
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c607.content: Host directly to the web from Google Drive & OneDrive. Static sites only. Free forever. One site per Google/Microsoft account.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c608.title: Fenix Web Server
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c608.content: A developer desktop app for hosting sites locally and sharing them publically (in real-time). Work however you like, using its beautiful user interface, API, and/or CLI.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c609.title: Fern
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c609.content: Build and host a Markdown-based documentation site on Fern's free plan. You can even auto-generate an API reference for your site from API definition files. The site is hosted at _yoursite_.docs.buildwithfern.com.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c60a.title: Free Hosting
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c60a.content: Free Hosting With PHP 5, Perl, CGI, MySQL, FTP, File Manager, POP E-Mail, free sub-domains, free domain hosting, DNS Zone Editor, Web Site Statistics, FREE Online Support and many more features not offered by other free hosts.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c60b.title: Freehostia
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c60b.content: FreeHostia offers free hosting services incl. an industry-best Control Panel & a 1-click installation of 50+ free apps. Instant setup. No forced ads.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c60c.title: HelioHost
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c60c.content: Non-profit free web hosting with Plesk control panel, PHP, Node.js, Python, Django, Flask, .NET, Perl, CGI, MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, IMAP/POP3/SMTP email, unlimited bandwidth, free subdomains, 1000 MB storage for free with the option to upgrade.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c60d.title: Kinsta Static Site Hosting
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c60d.content: Deploy up to 100 static sites for free, custom domains with SSL, 100 GB monthly bandwidth, 260+ Cloudflare CDN locations.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c60e.title: Lecturify
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c60e.content: Web hosting with SFPT access for file upload and download, php available.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c60f.title: Neocities
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c60f.content: Static, 1 GB free storage with 200 GB Bandwidth.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c610.title: Netlify
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c610.content: Builds, deploys and hosts static site/app free for 100 GB data and 100 GB/month bandwidth.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c611.title: pantheon.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c611.content: Drupal and WordPress hosting, automated DevOps, and scalable infrastructure. Free for developers and agencies. No custom domain.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c612.title: readthedocs.org
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c612.content: Free documentation hosting with versioning, PDF generation, and more

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c613.title: render.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c613.content: Unified cloud to build and run apps and sites with free SSL, a global CDN, private networks, auto-deploys from Git, and completely free plans for web services, databases, and static web pages.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c614.title: SourceForge
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c614.content: Find, Create, and Publish Open Source software for free

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c615.title: surge.sh
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c615.content: Static web publishing for Front-End developers. Unlimited sites with custom domain support

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c617.title: tilda.cc
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c617.content: One site, 50 pages, 50 MB storage, only the main pre-defined blocks among 170+ available, no fonts, no favicon, and no custom domain

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c618.title: Vercel
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c618.content: Build, deploy, and host web apps with free SSL, global CDN, and unique Preview URLs each time you `git push`. Perfect for Next.js and other Static Site Generators.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c619.title: Versoly
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c619.content: SaaS-focused website builder - unlimited websites, 70+ blocks, five templates, custom CSS, favicon, SEO and forms. No custom domain.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c61a.title: Qoddi
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c61a.content: PaaS service similar to Heroku with a developer-centric approach and all-inclusive features. Free tier for static assets, staging, and developer apps.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c61b.title: FreeFlarum
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c61b.content: Community-powered free Flarum hosting for up to 250 users (donate to remove the watermark from the footer).

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c61c.title: fleek.co
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c61c.content: Build modern sites and apps on the Open Web and its protocols seamlessly free for unlimited websites and 50 GB/month bandwidth.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c61d.title: MDB GO
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c61d.content: Free hosting for one project with two weeks Container TTL, 500 MB RAM per project, SFTP - 1G disk space.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c61e.title: Patr Cloud
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c61e.content: An easy-to-use cloud platform, among its paid services it offers to host three static sites for free.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c61f.title: Serv00.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c61f.content: 3 GB of free web hosting with daily backups (7 days). Support: Crontab jobs, SSH access, repositories (GIT, SVN, and Mercurial), support: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, PHP, Node.js, Python, Ruby, Java, Perl, TCL/TK, Lua, Erlang, Rust, Pascal, C, C++, D, R, and many more.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c620.content: Free public DNS Resolver, which is fast and secure (encrypt your DNS query), provided by Cloudflare. Useful to bypass your internet provider's DNS blocking, prevent DNS query spying, and [to block adult & malware content](https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/1.1.1.1-for-families). It can also be used [via API](https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/encrypted-dns/dns-over-https/make-api-requests). Note: Just a DNS resolver, not a DNS hoster.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c621.title: 1984.is
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c621.content: Free DNS service with API and lots of other free DNS features included.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c622.title: cloudns.net
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c622.content: Free DNS hosting up to 1 domain with 50 records

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c623.title: deSEC
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c623.content: Free DNS hosting with API support, designed with security in mind. Runs on open-source software and is supported by [SSE](https://www.securesystems.de/).

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c624.title: dns.he.net
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c624.content: Free DNS hosting service with Dynamic DNS Support

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c625.title: Zonomi
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c625.content: Free DNS hosting service with instant DNS propagation. Free plan: 1 DNS zone (domain name) with up to 10 DNS records.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c627.title: duckdns.org
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c627.content: Free DDNS with up to 5 domains on the free tier. With configuration guides for various setups.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c628.title: Dynv6.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c628.content: Free DDNS service with [API support](https://dynv6.com/docs/apis) and management of a lot of dns record types (like CNAME, MX, SPF, SRV, TXT and others).

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c629.title: freedns.afraid.org
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c629.content: Free DNS hosting. Also, provide free subdomains based on numerous public user [contributed domains](https://freedns.afraid.org/domain/registry/). Get free subdomains from the "Subdomains" menu after signing up.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c62a.title: luadns.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c62a.content: Free DNS hosting, three domains, all features with reasonable limits

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c62b.title: namecheap.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c62b.content: Free DNS. No limit on the number of domains

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c62d.title: noip.at
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c62d.content: Free DDNS service without registration, tracking, logging or advertising. No limit to domains.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c62e.title: noip
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c62e.content: a dynamic DNS service that allows up to 3 hostnames free with confirmation every 30 days

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c62f.title: sslip.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c62f.content: Free DNS service that when queried with a hostname with an embedded IP address returns that IP address.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c631.title: zoneedit.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c631.content: Free DNS hosting with Dynamic DNS Support.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c632.title: zonewatcher.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c632.content: Automatic backups and DNS change monitoring. One domain free

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c636.title: eu.org
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c636.content: Free eu.org domain. The request is usually approved in 14 days.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c639.title: 4EVERLAND
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c639.content: Compatible with AWS S3 - APIs, interface operations, CLI, and other upload methods, upload and store files from the IPFS and Arweave networks in a safe, convenient, and efficient manner. Registered users can get 6 GB of IPFS storage and 300MB of Arweave storage for free. Any Arweave file uploads smaller than 150 KB are free.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c63a.title: backblaze.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c63a.content: Backblaze B2 cloud storage. Free 10 GB (Amazon S3-like) object storage for unlimited time

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c63b.title: filebase.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c63b.content: S3 Compatible Object Storage Powered by Blockchain. 5 GB free storage for an unlimited duration.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c63c.title: Tebi
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c63c.content: S3 compatibility object storage.Free 25 GB storage and 250GB outbound transfer.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c63d.title: Idrive e2
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c63d.content: S3 compatibility object storage. 10 GB free storage and 10 GB download bandwidth per month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c63e.title: C2 Object Storage
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c63e.content: S3 compatibility object storage. 15 GB free storage and 15 GB downloads per month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c63f.title: Aiven
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c63f.content: Aiven offers free PostgreSQL, MySQL and Redis plans on its open-source data platform. Single node, 1 CPU, 1GB RAM, and for PostgreSQL and MySQL, 5GB storage. Easy migration to more extensive plans or across clouds.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c640.title: airtable.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c640.content: Looks like a spreadsheet, but it's a relational database unlimited bases, 1,200 rows/base, and 1,000 API requests/month

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c641.title: Astra
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c641.content: Cloud Native Cassandra as a Service with [80GB free tier](https://www.datastax.com/products/datastax-astra/pricing)

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c642.title: codehooks.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c642.content: Easy to use JavaScript serverless API/backend and NoSQL database service with functions, Mongdb-ish queries, key/value lookups, a job system, realtime messages, worker queues, a powerful CLI and a web-based data manager. Free plan has 5GB storage and 60/API calls per minute. 2 developers included. No credit-card required.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c643.title: CrateDB
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c643.content: Distributed Open Source SQL database for real-time analytics. [Free Tier CRFREE](https://crate.io/lp-crfree): One-node with 2 CPUs, 2 GiB of memory, 8 GiB of storage. One cluster per organization, no payment method needed.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c644.title: FaunaDB
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c644.content: Serverless cloud database with native GraphQL, multi-model access, and daily free tiers up to 100 MB

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c645.title: Upstash
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c645.content: Serverless Redis with free tier up to 10,000 requests per day, 256MB max database size, and 20 concurrent connections

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c647.title: redsmin.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c647.content: Online real-time monitoring and administration service for Redis, Monitoring for 1 Redis instance free

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c649.title: MemCachier
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c649.content: Managed Memcache service. Free for up to 25MB, 1 Proxy Server, and basic analytics

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c64a.title: scalingo.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c64a.content: Primarily a PaaS but offers a 128MB to 192MB free tier of MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c64b.title: SeaTable
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c64b.content: Flexible, Spreadsheet-like Database built by the Seafile team. unlimited tables, 2,000 lines, 1-month versioning, up to 25 team members.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c64c.title: skyvia.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c64c.content: Cloud Data Platform offers a free tier and all plans are completely free while in beta

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c64d.title: StackBy
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c64d.content: One tool that combines spreadsheets' flexibility, databases' power, and built-in integrations with your favorite business apps. The free plan includes unlimited users, ten stacks, and a 2GB attachment per stack.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c64e.title: TiDB Cloud
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c64e.content: TiDB is an open-source MySQL-compatible distributed HTAP RDBMS. TiDB Serverless provides 5GB of row storage, 5GB of column storage, and 50 million Request Units (RUs) for free each month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c64f.title: Turso by ChiselStrike
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c64f.content: Turso is SQLite Developer Experience in an Edge Database. Turso provides a Free Forever starter plan, 9 GB of total storage, Up to 500 databases, Up to 3 locations, 1 billion row reads per month, and Local development support with SQLite.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c650.title: InfluxDB
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c650.content: Timeseries database, free up to 3MB/5 minutes writes, 30MB/5 minutes reads and 10,000 cardinalities series

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c651.title: restdb.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c651.content: a fast and straightforward NoSQL cloud database service. With restdb.io you get schema, relations, automatic REST API (with MongoDB-like queries), and an efficient multi-user admin UI for working with data. The free plan allows 3 users, 2500 records, and 1 API request per second.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c653.title: Neo4j Aura
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c653.content: Managed native Graph DBMS / analytics platform with a Cypher query language and a REST API. Limits on graph size (50k nodes, 175k relationships).

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c654.title: Neon
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c654.content: Managed PostgreSQL, 0.5 GB of storage (total), 1 Project ,10 branches, Unlimited Databases, always-available primary branch ( Auto suspend after 5 minutes), 20 hours of Active time per month (total) for non-primary branch compute.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c655.title: Dgraph Cloud
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c655.content: Managed native Graph DBMS with a GraphQL API. Limited to 1 MB data transfer per day.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c656.title: Tinybird
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c656.content: A serverless managed ClickHouse with connection-less data ingest over HTTP and lets you publish SQL queries as managed HTTP APIs. There is no time limit on free-tier, 10GB storage + 1000 API requests per day.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c657.title: TigerGraph Cloud
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c657.content: Managed native Graph DBMS / analytics platform with a SQL-like graph query language and a REST API. One free instance with two vCPU, 8GB Memory, and 50GB storage that sleeps after 1 hour of inactivity.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c658.title: TerminusCMS
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c658.content: Managed free service for TerminusDB, a document and graph database written in Prolog and Rust. Free for dev, paid service for enterprise deployments and support.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c659.title: filess.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c659.content: filess.io is a platform where you can create two databases with up to 10 MB per database of the following DBMS for free: MySQL, MariaDB, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c65a.title: xata.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c65a.content: Xata is a serverless database with built-in powerful search and analytics. One API, multiple type-safe client libraries, and optimized for your development workflow. The free-forever tier is sufficient for hobby developers which comes with three units of Xata, please refer to the website for unit definition.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c65b.title: 8base.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c65b.content: 8base is a full-stack low-code development platform built for JavaScript developers built on top of MySQL and GraphQL and serverless backend-as-a-service. It allows you to start building web applications quickly using a UI app builder and scale quickly, The Free tier includes rows: 2,500, Storage: 500, Serverless computing: 1Gb/h, and client app users: 5.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c65c.title: Nile
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c65c.content: A Postgres platform for B2B apps. Unlimited databases, Always available with no shutdown, 1GB of storage (total), 50 million query tokens, autoscaling, unlimited vector embeddings

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c65d.title: Pinggy
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c65d.content: Public URLs for localhost with a single command, no downloads required. HTTPS / TCP / TLS tunnels. The free plan has 60 minutes tunnel lifetime.
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c65d.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c65e.title: conveyor.cloud
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c65e.content: Visual Studio extension to expose IIS Express to the local network or over a tunnel to a public URL.
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c65e.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c65f.title: Hamachi
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c65f.content: LogMeIn Hamachi is a hosted VPN service that lets you securely extend LAN-like networks to distributed teams with a free plan that allows unlimited networks with up to 5 people
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c65f.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c660.title: Mirna Sockets
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c660.content: Free Socket as a Service Platform that gives you a wss:// URL when deploying your Web Socket Server code and also allows you to monitor its performance.
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c660.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c661.title: localhost.run
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c661.content: Expose locally running servers over a tunnel to a public URL.
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c661.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c662.title: localtunnel
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c662.content: Expose locally running servers over a tunnel to a public URL. Free hosted version, and [open source](https://github.com/localtunnel/localtunnel).
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c662.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c663.title: ngrok.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c663.content: Expose locally running servers over a tunnel to a public URL.
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c663.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c664.title: cname.dev
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c664.content: Free and secure dynamic reverse proxy service.
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c664.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c665.title: serveo
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c665.content: Expose local servers to the internet. No installation, no signup. Free subdomain, no limits.
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c665.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c666.title: Radmin VPN
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c666.content: Connect multiple computers together via a VPN-enabling LAN-like network. Unlimited peers. (Hamachi alternative)
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c666.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c667.title: segment.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c667.content: Hub to translate and route events to other third-party services. 100,000 events/month free
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c667.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c668.title: Google STUN — [stun:stun.l.google.com:19302](stun:stun.l.google.com:19302)
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c668.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c669.title: Twilio STUN — [stun:global.stun.twilio.com:3478?transport=udp](stun:global.stun.twilio.com:3478?transport=udp)
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c669.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c66a.title: Tailscale
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c66a.content: Zero config VPN, using the open-source WireGuard protocol. Installs on MacOS, iOS, Windows, Linux, and Android devices. Free plan for personal use with 100 devices and three users.
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c66a.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c66b.title: webhookrelay.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c66b.content: Manage, debug, fan-out, and proxy all your webhooks to public or internal (i.e. localhost) destinations. Also, expose servers running in a private network over a tunnel by getting a public HTTP endpoint (`https://yoursubdomain.webrelay.io <----> http://localhost:8080`).
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c66b.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c66c.title: Hookdeck
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c66c.content: Develop, test, and monitor your webhooks from anywhere. 100K requests and 100K attempts per month with three days retention.
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c66c.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c66d.title: Xirsys
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c66d.content: Unlimited STUN usage + 500 MB monthly TURN bandwidth, capped bandwidth, single geographic region.
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c66d.category: Tunneling, WebRTC, Web Socket Servers and Other Routers

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c66e.title: ZeroTier
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c66e.content: FOSS managed virtual Ethernet as a service. Unlimited end-to-end encrypted networks of 25 clients on the free plan. Clients for desktop/mobile/NA; web interface for configuration of custom routing rules and approval of new client nodes on private networks

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6bb.title: icedrive.net

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6c7.content: Unlimited image chart generation with a watermark

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6ca.title: imgen
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6ca.content: Free unlimited social cover image generation API, no watermark

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6cb.title: imgix

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6cc.title: kraken.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6cc.content: Image optimization for website performance as a service, free plan up to 1 MB file size

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6cd.title: kvstore.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6cd.content: Key-value storage service. The free tier allows 100 keys, 1KB/key, 100 calls/hour

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6ce.title: npoint.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6ce.content: JSON store with collaborative schema editing

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6cf.title: nitropack.io

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6d4.title: placekitten.com

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6d5.title: plot.ly
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6d5.content: Graph and share your data. The free tier includes unlimited public files and ten private files

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6d7.title: QuickChart
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6d7.content: Generate embeddable image charts, graphs, and QR codes

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6d8.title: redbooth.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6d8.content: P2P file syncing, free for up to 2 users

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c6da.content: API to generate and edit video at scale. Free up to 20 minutes of rendered video per month

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c76d.content: Android Studio provides the fastest tools for building apps on every type of Android device. Open Source IDE is free for everyone and the best Android app development. Available for Windows, Mac, Linux, and even ChromeOS!

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c76e.title: AndroidIDE
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c76e.content: An Open Source IDE to develop real, Gradle-based Android applications on Android devices.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c76f.title: Apache Netbeans
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c76f.content: Development Environment, Tooling Platform and Application Framework.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c770.title: apiary.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c770.content: Collaborative design API with instant API mock and generated documentation (Free for unlimited API blueprints and unlimited users with one admin account and hosted documentation).

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c771.title: BBEdit
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c771.content: BBEdit is a popular and extensible editor for macOS. Free Mode provides a [powerful core feature set](https://www.barebones.com/products/bbedit/comparison.html) and an upgrade path to advanced features.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c772.title: Binder
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c772.content: Turn a Git repo into a collection of interactive notebooks. It is a free public service.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c773.title: BlueJ
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c773.content: A free Java Development Environment designed for beginners, used by millions worldwide. Powered by Oracle & simple GUI to help beginners.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c774.title: Bootify.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c774.content: Spring Boot app generator with custom database and REST API.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c775.title: Brackets
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c775.content: Brackets is an open-source text editor specifically designed for web development. It is lightweight, easy to use, and highly customizable.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c776.title: cacher.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c776.content: Code snippet organizer with labels and support for 100+ programming languages.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c777.title: Code::Blocks
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c777.content: Free Fortran & C/C++ IDE. Open Source and runs on Windows,macOS & Linux.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c778.title: Cody
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c778.content: Free AI coding assistant that can write (Code blocks, autocomplete, unit tests), understand (knowledge of your entire codebase), fix, and find your code. Available for VS Code, JetBrains and Online.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c779.title: codiga.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c779.content: Coding Assistant that lets you search, define, and reuse code snippets directly in your IDE. Free for individual and small organizations.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c77a.title: codesnip.com.br
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c77a.content: Simple code snippets manager with categories, search and tags. free and unlimited.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c77b.title: cocalc.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c77b.content: (formerly SageMathCloud at cloud.sagemath.com) — Collaborative calculation in the cloud. Browser access to full Ubuntu with built-in collaboration and lots of free software for mathematics, science, data science, preinstalled: Python, LaTeX, Jupyter Notebooks, SageMath, scikitlearn, etc.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c77c.title: code.cs50.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c77c.content: Visual Studio Code for CS50 is a web app at code.cs50.io that adapts GitHub Codespaces for students and teachers.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c77d.title: codepen.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c77d.content: CodePen is a playground for the front-end side of the web.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c77e.title: codesandbox.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c77e.content: Online Playground for React, Vue, Angular, Preact, and more.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c77f.title: Components.studio
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c77f.content: Code components in isolation, visualize them in stories, test them, and publish them on npm.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c780.title: Eclipse Che
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c780.content: Web-based and Kubernetes-Native IDE for Developer Teams with multi-language support. Open Source and community-driven. An online instance hosted by Red Hat is available at [workspaces.openshift.com](https://workspaces.openshift.com/).

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c781.title: fakejson.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c781.content: FakeJSON helps you quickly generate fake data using its API. Make an API request describing what you want and how you want it. The API returns it all in JSON. Speed up the go-to-market process for ideas and fake it till you make it.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c782.title: GetVM
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c782.content: Instant free Linux and IDEs chrome sidebar. The free tier includes 5 VMs per day.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c783.title: GitPod
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c783.content: Instant, ready-to-code dev environments for GitHub projects. The free tier includes 50 hours/month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c785.title: JDoodle
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c785.content: Online compiler and editor for more than 60 programming languages with a free plan for REST API code compiling up to 200 credits per day.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c786.title: jetbrains.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c786.content: Productivity tools, IDEs and deploy tools (aka [IntelliJ IDEA](https://www.jetbrains.com/idea/), [PyCharm](https://www.jetbrains.com/pycharm/), etc). Free license for students, teachers, Open Source and user groups.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c787.title: jsbin.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c787.content: JS Bin is another playground and code-sharing site of front-end web (HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It Also supports Markdown, Jade, and Sass).

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c788.title: jsfiddle.net
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c788.content: JS Fiddle is a playground and code-sharing site of front-end web, supporting collaboration.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c78a.title: Lazarus
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c78a.content: Lazarus is a Delphi-compatible cross-platform IDE for Rapid Application Development.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c78c.title: micro-jaymock
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c78c.content: Tiny API mocking microservice for generating fake JSON data.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c78d.title: mockable.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c78d.content: Mockable is a simple configurable service to mock out RESTful API or SOAP web services. This online service allows you to quickly define REST API or SOAP endpoints and have them return JSON or XML data.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c78e.title: mockaroo
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c78e.content: Mockaroo lets you generate realistic test data in CSV, JSON, SQL, and Excel formats. You can also create mocks for back-end API.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c78f.title: Mocklets
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c78f.content: an HTTP-based mock API simulator that helps simulate APIs for faster parallel development and more comprehensive testing, with a lifetime free tier.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c790.title: Paiza
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c790.content: Develop Web apps in Browser without needing to set up anything. Free Plan offers one server with 24 24-hour lifetime and 4 hours of running time per day with 2 CPU cores, 2 GB RAM, and 1 GB storage.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c791.title: Prepros
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c791.content: Prepros can compile Sass, Less, Stylus, Pug/Jade, Haml, Slim, CoffeeScript, and TypeScript out of the box, reloads your browsers and makes it easy to develop & test your websites so you can focus on making them perfect. You can also add your own tools with just a few clicks.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c792.title: Replit
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c792.content: A cloud coding environment for various program languages.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c793.title: SoloLearn
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c793.content: A cloud programming playground well-suited for running code snippets. Supports various programming languages. No registration is required for running code, but it is necessary when saving code on their platform. Also offers free courses for beginners and intermediate-level coders.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c794.title: stackblitz.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c794.content: Online/Cloud Code IDE to create, edit, & deploy full-stack apps. Support any popular NodeJs-based frontend & backend frameworks. Shortlink to create a new project: [https://node.new](https://node.new).

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c795.title: Sublime Text
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c795.content: Sublime Text is a popular, versatile, and highly customizable text editor used for coding and text editing tasks.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c796.title: Visual Studio Code
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c796.content: Code editor redefined and optimized for building and debugging modern web and cloud applications. Developed by Microsoft.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c797.title: Visual Studio Community
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c797.content: Fully-featured IDE with thousands of extensions, cross-platform app development (Microsoft extensions available for download for iOS and Android), desktop, web and cloud development, multi-language support (C#, C++, JavaScript, Python, PHP and more).

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c798.title: VSCodium
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c798.content: Community-driven, without telemetry/tracking, and freely-licensed binary distribution of Microsoft's editor VSCode

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c799.title: wakatime.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c799.content: Quantified self-metrics about your coding activity using text editor plugins, limited plan for free.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c79a.title: Wave Terminal
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c79a.content: Wave is an open-source, cross-platform terminal for seamless workflows. Render anything inline. Save sessions and history. Powered by open web standards. MacOS and Linux.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c79b.title: WebComponents.dev
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c79b.content: In-browser IDE to code web components in isolation with 58 templates available, supporting stories, and tests.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c79d.title: WebDB
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c79d.content: Free Efficient Database IDE. Featuring Server Discovery, ERD, Data Generator, AI, NoSQL Structure Manager, Database Versioning and many more.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c79e.title: Zed
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c79e.content: Zed is a high-performance, multiplayer code editor from the creators of Atom and Tree-sitter.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c79f.title: OneCompiler
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c79f.content: Free online compiler supporting 70+ languages including Java, Python, C++, JavaScript.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a0.title: Dwh.dev
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a0.content: Data Cloud Observability Solution (Snowflake). Free for personal use.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a1.title: Hightouch
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a1.content: Hightouch is a Reverse ETL platform that helps you sync customer data from your data warehouse to your CRM, marketing, and support tools. The free tier offers you one destination to sync data to.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a2.title: Avo
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a2.content: Simplified analytics release workflow. Single-source-of-truth tracking plan, type-safe analytics tracking library, in-app debuggers, and data observability to catch all data issues before you release. Free for two workspace members and 1 hour data observability lookback.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a3.title: Branch
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a3.content: Mobile Analytics Platform. Free Tier offers up to 10K Mobile App Users with deep-linking & other services.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a4.title: Cauldron
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a4.content: Analytics open source solution that allows users to aggregate information from multiple collaboration platforms as different types of data sources (Git, Github, and Gitlab). The free tier includes an unlimited number of reports.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a5.title: Census
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a5.content: Reverse ETL & Operational Analytics Platform. Sync 10 fields from your data warehouse to 60+ SaaS like Salesforce, Zendesk, or Amplitude.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a6.title: Clicky
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a6.content: Website Analytics Platform. Free Plan for one website with 3000 views analytics.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a7.title: Databox
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a7.content: Business Insights & Analytics by combining other analytics & BI platforms. Free Plan offers 3 users, dashboards & data sources. 11M historical data records.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a9.title: amplitude.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7a9.content: 1 million monthly events, up to 2 apps

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7aa.title: GoatCounter
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7aa.content: GoatCounter is an open-source web analytics platform available as a hosted service (free for non-commercial use) or self-hosted app. It aims to offer easy-to-use and meaningful privacy-friendly web analytics as an alternative to Google Analytics or Matomo. The free tier is for non-commercial use and includes unlimited sites, six months of data retention, and 100k pageviews/month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7ac.title: MetricsWave
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7ac.content: Privacy-friendly Google Analytics alternative for developers. Free plan allows 20k pageviews per month without credit card.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7ad.title: Expensify
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7ad.content: Expense reporting, free personal reporting approval workflow

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7ae.title: getinsights.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7ae.content: Privacy-focused, cookie-free analytics, free for up to 3k events/month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7af.title: heap.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7af.content: Automatically captures every user action in iOS or web apps. Free for up to 10K monthly sessions.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b0.title: Hotjar
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b0.content: Website Analytics and Reports . Free Plan allows 2000 pageviews/day. One hundred snapshots/day (max capacity: 300). Three snapshot heatmaps can be stored for 365 days. Unlimited Team Members. Also in App and standalone surveys, feedback widgets with screenshots. Free tier allows creating 3 surveys & 3 feedback widgets and collecting 20 responses per month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b1.title: Keen
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b1.content: Custom Analytics for data collection, analysis and visualization. 1,000 events/month free

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b2.title: Yandex.Datalens
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b2.content: Yandex Cloud data visualization and analysis service. The service is provided free of charge. No restrictions on the number of users and requests.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b4.title: Mixpanel
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b4.content: 100,000 monthly tracked users, unlimited data history and seats, US or EU data residency

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b5.title: Moesif
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b5.content: API analytics for REST and GraphQL. (Free up to 500,000 API calls/mo)

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b6.title: optimizely.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b6.content: A/B Testing solution, free starter plan, one website, 1 iOS, and 1 Android app

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b7.title: Microsoft PowerBI
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b7.content: Business Insights & Analytics by Microsoft. Free Plan offers limited use with 1 Million User licenses.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b8.title: Row Zero
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b8.content: Blazingly fast, connected spreadsheet. Connect directly to data databases, S3, and APIs. Import, analyze, graph, and share millions of rows instantly. Three free (forever) workbooks.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b9.title: sematext.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7b9.content: Free for up to 50 K actions/month, 1-day data retention, unlimited dashboards, users, etc.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7ba.title: Similar Web
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7ba.content: Analytics for Web & Mobile Apps. Free Plan offers five results per metric, one month of mobile app data & 3 months of website data.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7bb.title: StatCounter
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7bb.content: Website Viewer Analytics. Free plan for analytics of 500 most recent visitors.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7bc.title: Statsig
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7bc.content: All-in-one platform spanning across analytics, feature flagging, and A/B testing. Free for up to 1m metered events per month. Also provides unlinited in-App Surveys with 250/month responses.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7bd.title: Tableau Developer Program
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7bd.content: Innovate, create, and make Tableau work perfectly for your organization. The free developer program gives a personal development sandbox license for Tableau Online. The version is the latest pre-release version so Data Devs can test each & every feature of this superb platform.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7be.title: usabilityhub.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7be.content: Test designs and mockups on real people and track visitors. Free for one user, unlimited tests

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7bf.title: woopra.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7bf.content: Free user analytics platform for 500K actions, 90-day data retention, 30+ one-click integration.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c0.title: counter.dev
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c0.content: Web analytics made simple and therefore privacy friendly. Free or pay what you want by donation.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c1.title: PostHog
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c1.content: Full Product Analytics suite free for up to 1m tracked events per month. Also provides unlinited in-App Surveys with 250/month responses.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c2.title: Uptrace
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c2.content: Distributed Tracing Tool that helps developers pinpoint failures and find performance bottlenecks. Has a free plan, offers a complimentary Personal subscription for open-source projects, and has an open-source version.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c3.title: Microsoft Clarity
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c3.content: Clarity is a free, easy-to-use tool that captures how real people use your site.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c4.title: Beampipe.io
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c4.content: Beampipe is simple, privacy-focussed web analytics. free for up to 5 domains & 10k monthly page views.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c5.title: Aptabase
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c5.content: Open Source, Privacy-Friendly, and Simple Analytics for Mobile and Desktop Apps. SDKs for Swift, Kotlin, React Native, Flutter, Electron, and many others. Free for up to 20,000 events per month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c6.title: Trackingplan
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c6.content: Automatically detect digital analytics, marketing data and pixels issues, maintain up-to-date tracking plans, and foster seamless collaboration. Deploy it to your production environment with real traffic or add analytics coverage to your regression tests without writing code.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c7.title: LogSpot
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c7.content: Full unified web and product analytics platform, including embeddable analytics widgets and automated robots (slack, telegram, and webhooks). Free plan includes 10,000 events per month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c8.title: Umami
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c8.content: Simple, fast, privacy-focused, open-source alternative to Google Analytics.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c9.title: TrackWith Dicloud
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7c9.content: Free lightweight privacy-focused alternative to Google Analytics. Unlimited pageviews, unlimited visitor, unlimited page heatmaps & goal tracking. Free for up to 3 domains and 600 session replay per domain.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7ca.title: AppFit
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7ca.content: AppFit is a comprehensive analytics and product management tool designed to facilitate seamless, cross-platform management of analytics and product updates. Free plan includes 10,000 events per month, product journal and weekly insights.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7cb.title: Seline
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7cb.content: Seline is a simple & private website and product analytics. Cookieless, lightweight, independent. Free plan includes 3,000 events per month and provides access to all our features, such as the dashboard, user journeys, funnels, and more.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7cc.title: Reactflow.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7cc.content: Per site: 1,000 pages views/day, three heatmaps, three widgets, free bug tracking

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7cd.title: OpenReplay.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7cd.content: Open-source session replay with dev tools for bug reproduction, live session for real-time support, and product analytics suite. One thousand sessions/month with access to all features and 7-day retention.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7ce.title: LogRocket.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7ce.content: 1,000 sessions/month with 30-day retention, error tracking, live mode

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7cf.title: FullStory.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7cf.content: 1,000 sessions/month with one month data retention and three user seats. More information [here](https://help.fullstory.com/hc/en-us/articles/360020623354-FullStory-Free-Edition).

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7d0.title: hotjar.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7d0.content: Per site: 1,050 pages views/month, unlimited heatmaps, data stored for three months

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7d2.title: Microsoft Clarity
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7d2.content: Session recording completely free with "no traffic limits", no project limits, and no sampling

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7d5.title: smartlook.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7d5.content: free packages for web and mobile apps (1500 sessions/month), three heatmaps, one funnel, 1-month data history

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7d6.title: howuku.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7d6.content: Track user interaction, engagement, and event. Free for up to 5,000 visits/month

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7d7.title: UXtweak.com
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7d7.content: Record and watch how visitors use your website or app. Free unlimited time for small projects

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7d8.title: numverify
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7d8.content: Global phone number validation and lookup JSON API. 100 API requests/month
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7d8.category: International Mobile Number Verification API and SDK

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7d9.title: veriphone
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7d9.content: Global phone number verification in a free, fast, reliable JSON API. 1000 requests/month
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7d9.category: International Mobile Number Verification API and SDK

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7da.title: Qonversion
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7da.content: All-in-one cross-platform subscription management platform offering analytics, A/B testing, Apple Search Ads, remote configs, and growth tools for optimizing in-app purchases and monetization. Compatible with iOS, Android, React Native, Flutter, Unity, Cordova, Stripe, and web. Free up to $10k in monthly tracked revenue.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7de.title: CoinMarketCap
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7de.content: Provides cryptocurrency market data including the latest crypto and fiat currency exchange rates. The free tier offers 10K call credits/month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7df.title: CurrencyFreaks
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7df.content: Provides current and historical currency exchange rates. Free DEVELOPER plan available with 1000 requests/month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7e0.title: CoinGecko
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7e0.content: Provides cryptocurrency market data including the latest crypto exchange rates and historical data. The demo api comes with a stable rate limit of 30 calls/min and a monthly cap of 10,000 calls.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7e1.title: CurrencyApi
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7e1.content: Live Currency Rates for Physical and Cryptocurrencies, delivered in JSON and XML. The free tier offers 1,250 API requests/month.

67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7e2.title: currencylayer
67f516bcb9b1f166afc6c7e2.content: Reliable Exchange Rates and Currency Conversion for your Business, 100 API requests/month free.
